data: In the writing of books, as all the world knows, two things are above all other things essentialâ€”the one is to know exactly when and where to leave off, and the other to be equally certain when and where to begin.

In the writing of books, as all the world knows, two things are above all other things essential--the one is to know exactly when and where to leave off, and the other to be equally certain when and where to begin.
The Definite Object: A Romance of New York
